trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> named `ValidateDateAndPrice`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> chamado `ValidateDateAndPrice`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> for this rule is set to ConvertedProposedValue so that when it runs, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method has access to values that are of the source property's type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> para essa regra é definida como ConvertedProposedValue para que, quando ele é executado, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> método tem acesso aos valores do tipo da propriedade de origem.

trans-unit.source: When the `PriceIsAPositiveNumber` and `FutureDateRule` rules run, the values in each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method are strings because the default value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> is RawProposedValue.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `PriceIsAPositiveNumber` e `FutureDateRule` regras executadas, os valores em cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> método são cadeias de caracteres porque o valor padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A> é RawProposedValue.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the rules run before the values are converted to their respective types.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, as regras forem executadas antes dos valores são convertidos em seus respectivos tipos.
A exemplo a seguir mostra o `ValidateDateAndPrice` <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.ValidationStep%2A>.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method, the `Price` property is of type <xref:System.Double> and the `OfferExpires` property is of type <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> método, o `Price` é de propriedade do tipo <xref:System.Double> e `OfferExpires` é de propriedade do tipo <xref:System.DateTime>.

trans-unit.source: The strings have been converted to their respective types by the time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> runs.
trans-unit.target: As cadeias de caracteres foram convertidas em seus respectivos tipos pelo tempo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> é executado.

trans-unit.source: Runs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> after the value has been committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> após o valor ser confirmado para a origem.

trans-unit.source: Runs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> after the value is converted.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> após o valor ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Runs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> before any conversion occurs.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> antes que qualquer conversão ocorra.

trans-unit.source: Runs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> after the source is updated.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule" /> após a origem ser atualizada.
